ComicInfo.Series: Vampirella: Hell on Earth Battlebook - Streets of Fire
ComicInfo.Summary: This is not a normal Vampirella comic book, but was one in a series of a game known as Battlebooks. You could take on the role of your favorite hero or heroine, throughout a variety of publishers. Each page in the book featured a full size picture of the main character performing various fighting actions with a variety of stats and battle rules included. Using these attacks and stats, you were able to pit Vampirella against a variety of other characters.
ComicInfo.Title: Vampirella
